duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee revenue operations supporting Sales and Renewals teams, ensuring accurate revenue forecasting.
Collaborate with the leadership team to optimize headcount requirements based on revenue targets.
Track and analyze key performance indicators (KPIs) related to Sales and Renewals performance, implementing strategies to enhance overall performance.
Provide insightful reporting and accurate forecasts on progress towards ambitious quarterly growth targets, supporting decision-making and driving accountability.
Forecast revenue growth accurately, providing forecasts to the executive leadership team to assist in shaping the company's strategy.

education_certification.credential: 4-6 years of experience in SaaS Operations or related fields, including a deep understanding of revenue operations and its impact on business growth
